description.value:
You signal a volley of ranged attacks from your allies. Signal all squadmates affected by your commander's banner; they can Interact to swap to a ranged weapon as a free action, Interact to reload as a free action, and then attempt a ranged Strike against an enemy that both you and they are observing as a reaction.

Special If one of your squadmates knows or has prepared a cantrip with a range of 30 feet or more, they can cast it targeting an enemy you both are observing instead of taking the other actions normally granted by this tactic.
